main event: A spherical, orange-red object, the size of a baseball, was observed moving slightly after appearing stationary.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 5 years., The object appeared orange-red and was noted as being the size of a baseball when held at arms length., Observers used binoculars to determine that the object was moving slightly., Initial perceptions suggested the object was stationary., Multiple conclusions were drawn regarding its nature, including possibilities of it being a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical in origin.
